alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 20 at 4:36PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Palm Beach County through 515 PM EDT... At 436 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wellington, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boca Raton, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Wellington, Highland Beach, Ocean Ridge, Lantana, Atlantis, Hamptons At Boca Raton, Village Of Golf, Whisper Walk, Kings Point, Dunes Road, Loxahatchee NWR, Boca Del Mar, Mission Bay, Hypoluxo, Gulf Stream, Briny Breezes and Manalapan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
